name: Antidote
description: A spray-type medicine. It lifts the effect of poison from one Pokémon.

name: Parlyz Heal
description: A spray-type medicine for paralysis. It can be used once to free a Pokemon that has been paralyzed.

name: Burn Heal
description: A spray-type medicine for treating burns. It can be used once to heal a Pokémon suffering from a burn.

name: Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 20 HP to an injured Pokémon.

name: Super Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 50 HP to an injured Pokémon.

name: Max Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It will completely restore the max HP of a single Pokémon.

name: Hyper Potion
description: A spray-type medicine for treating wounds. It can be used to restore 200 HP to an injured Pokémon.

name: Full Restore
description: A medicine that can be used to fully restore the HP of a single Pokémon and heal any status conditions it has.

name: Awakening
description: A spray-type medicine used against sleep. It can be used once to rouse a Pokémon from the clutches of sleep.

name: Revive
description: A medicine that can revive fainted Pokémon. It also restores half of a fainted Pokémon maximum HP.

name: Ice Heal
description: A spray-type medicine for freezing. It can be used once to defrost a Pokémon that has been frozen solid.

name: Full Heal
description: A spray-type medicine that is broadly effective. It can be used once to heal all the status conditions of a Pokémon.

name: Pokeball
description: A device for catching wild Pokémon. It is thrown like a ball at a Pokémon, comfortably encapsulating its target.

name: Great Ball
description: A good, high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher Pokémon catch rate than a standard Poké Ball.

name: Ultra Ball
description: An ultra-high-performance Poké Ball that provides a higher success rate for catching Pokémon than a Great Ball.

name: Premier Ball
description: A somewhat rare Poké Ball that was made as a commemorative item used to celebrate an event of some sort.

name: Repeat Ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well on a Pokémon species that has been caught before.

name: Timer Ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes progressively more effective the more turns that are taken in battle.

name: Nest Ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that becomes more effective the lower the level of the wild Pokémon.

name: Net Ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Water- or Bug-type Pokémon.

name: Dive Ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that works especially well when catching Pokémon that live underwater.

name: Luxury Ball
description: A particularly comfortable Poké Ball that makes a wild Pokémon quickly grow friendlier after being caught.

name: Heal Ball
description: A remedial Poké Ball that restores the HP of a Pokémon caught with it and eliminates any status conditions.

name: Quick Ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that has a more successful catch rate if used at the start of a wild encounter.

name: Dusk Ball
description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that makes it easier to catch wild Pokémon at night or in dark places like caves.

name: Fire Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. The stone has a fiery orange heart.

name: Water Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is the blue of a pool of clear water.

name: Thunder Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has a distinct thunderbolt pattern.

name: Leaf Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It has an unmistakable leaf pattern.

name: Moon Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is as black as the night sky.

name: Sun Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It burns as red as the evening sun.

name: Shiny Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It shines with a dazzling light.

name: Dusk Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It holds shadows as dark as can be.

name: Dawn Stone
description: A peculiar stone that can make certain species of Pokémon evolve. It sparkles like a glittering eye.

name: TM 32  - Double Team
description: By moving rapidly, the user makes illusory copies of itself to raise its evasiveness.

name: TM 33 - Reflect
description: A wondrous wall of light is put up to reduce damage from physical attacks for five turns.

name: TM 02 -  Razor Wind
description: In this two-turn attack, blades of wind hit opposing Pokémon on the second turn. Critical hits land more easily.

name: TM 07 - Horn Drill
description: The user stabs the target with a horn that rotates like a drill. The target faints instantly if this attack hits.

name: TM 37 - Egg Bomb
description: A large egg is hurled at the target with maximum force to inflict damage.

name: TM 01 - Mega Punch
description: The target is slugged by a punch thrown with muscle-packed power.

name: TM 05 - Mega Kick
description: The target is attacked by a kick launched with muscle-packed power.

name: TM 09 - Take Down
description: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

name: TM 17 - Submission
description: The user grabs the target and recklessly dives for the ground. This also damages the user a little.

name: HP Up
description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base HP of a single Pokémon.

name: Protein
description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Attack stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Iron
description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Defense stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Carbos
description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Speed stat of a single Pokémon.

name: Calcium
description: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. When consumed, it raises the base Sp. Atk stat of a single Pokémon.

name: X Accuracy
description: An item that sharply boosts the accuracy of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: Guard Spec
description: An item that prevents stat reduction among the Trainer's party Pokémon for five turns after it is used in battle.

name: Dire Hit
description: An item that raises the critical-hit ratio greatly. It can be used only once and wears off if the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Attack
description: An item that sharply boosts the Attack stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Defend
description: An item that sharply boosts the Defense stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Speed
description: An item that sharply boosts the Speed stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Special Defense
description: An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Def stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: X Special Attack
description: An item that sharply boosts the Sp. Atk stat of a Pokémon during a battle. It wears off once the Pokémon is withdrawn.

name: Escape Rope
description: A long and durable rope. Use it to escape instantly from a cave or a dungeon.

name: Repel
description: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while.

name: Super Repel
description: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer than Repel.

name: Max Repel
description: An item that prevents any low-level wild Pokémon from jumping out at you for a while. It lasts longer than Super Repel.

name: Poke Doll
description: A doll that attracts the attention of a Pokémon. It guarantees escape from any battle with wild Pokémon.
